name: NEON GUNSLINGER
description:
Set in a world where everything is either neon or guns! Fight through a horde of enemies, finish you one goal to kill them ALL!

Controls:

P - pause the game

LSHIFT - sprint

ESC - release cursor

E - interact/pickup objects

SPACE - jump

LEFT CLICK - shoot weapon

RIGHT CLICK - aim weapon

1 - switch to a pistol

2 - switch to a assault rifle

3 - switch to a sniper rifle

The music in this game is not made by me, check the artist out:
